name: Setsu
description:
SETSU

Love2D | 1 Player | 2017

Setsu is a tactical 1V1 game where you try to conquer as much territory as possible. It plays a bit like Go, but you take away nodes instead of adding them. Your territory is tallied when you are no longer connected with the other player.

I'm actively looking for playtesters and masters of strategy that are able to find dominating tactics in this game. Please let me know your thoughts via mail or twitter!

I'm still actively developing this project. These are the currently planned features:

  • basic AI
  • different playfields
  • support for up to 8 players
  • mobile port
